metadata.title: CVE-2019-25044 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The block subsystem in the Linux kernel before 5.2 has a use-after-freethat can lead to arbitrary code execution in the kernel context andprivilege escalation, aka CID-c3e2219216c9. This is related toblk_mq_free_rqs and blk_cleanup_queue.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
